entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Snow beginning after midnight. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 03 March 2023
